fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Deal a rampage attack to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You attack your visitors.
- You are redirect immune.
- You are roleblock immune.
- You are control immune.
- You bypass protective roles.
- You are detection immune.
- Your ability cannot fail, and this cannot be bypassed, even by things that say that they would bypass not being able to be bypassed.
- You cannot be banned.
- You cannot be modkilled.
- You cannot die during the night.
- You cannot die during the day, except by being hanged.
- If you are kicked, you are not removed from the game. The host has to inform you of all public notifications (votes, day/night, etc) through DMs and you may vote and use your ability in DMs. You may still be voted. If you return to the server, you return to normal.
- You cannot be muted.
- You cannot change roles unless you somehow changed into this role. Going from Plaguebearer doesn't count.
- You cannot lose any abilities that this has by default.
- You cannot lose any attributes that this has by default.
- This role cannot have its abilities and attributes copied.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: - However, other people can become this role, so long as one isn't already alive. If Plaguebearer (But Accustomed to GIM) is alive, others cannot become either.
